subject: Tajikistani Civil War
object: 5 May 1992 - 27 June 1997 | (5 years, 1 month, 3 weeks and 1 day)

subject: Tajikistani Civil War
object: Military stalemate | United Nations-sponsored armistice | Comprehensive Peace Agreement signed | Rahmon wins the 1999 Tajik presidential election | The United Tajik Opposition is promised 30% of the ministerial positions

subject: .mw-parser-output .reflist
predicate: The Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which was headed by the Taliban and governed 90% of Afghanistan, officially declared their neutrality in the conflict, though several Taliban factions went on to fight on the side of the opposition nonetheless.
